Goal Representation:
Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Wash the shirt.', '2. Iron the shirt.']

def is_clothes_shirt(x: item):
    symbol is_shirt=is_clothes_shirt(x)
    return is_shirt

behavior find_dirty_shirt(dirty_shirt: item):
    body:
        if not dirty(dirty_shirt):
            foreach shirt: item:
                if is_clothes_shirt(shirt) and dirty(shirt) and not visited(shirt):
                    observe(shirt, "Check if the shirt is dirty and in need of washing")
            achieve dirty(dirty_shirt)

behavior clean_shirt(shirt:item):
    body:
        achieve clean(shirt)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind dirty_shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(dirty_shirt) and dirty(dirty_shirt)
        find_dirty_shirt(dirty_shirt)
        clean_shirt(dirty_shirt)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Wash the shirt.', '2. Iron the shirt.']

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt) and dirty(shirt)
        # Select a shirt that is dirty
        
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink)
        # Select a sink
        
        bind washing_machine: item where:
            is_washing_machine(washing_machine)
        # Select a washing machine

        move(shirt)
        # Move the shirt near the washing machine
        
        achieve inside(shirt, washing_machine)
        # Put the shirt in the washing machine

        achieve is_on(washing_machine)
        # Turn on the washing machine to wash the shirt

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Wash the shirt.', '2. Iron the shirt.']

def in_bathroom(sink:item):
    symbol in_bathroom=exists room: item : is_bathroom(room) and inside(sink, room)
    return in_bathroom

def has_faucet(sink:item):
    symbol has_faucet=exists faucet:item: is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet,sink)  
    return has_faucet

behavior clean_shirt(shirt:item, sink:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inside(shirt, sink)
        if has_faucet(sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet,sink)
            achieve_once is_on(faucet)
            wash(shirt)
            achieve_once is_off(faucet)
        else:
            wash(shirt)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt) and dirty(shirt)
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink) and not in_bathroom(sink)
        clean_shirt(shirt, sink)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Wash the shirt.', '2. Iron the shirt.']

behavior wash_shirt(shirt:item):
    body:
        achieve clean(shirt)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt) and dirty(shirt)
        # Select the dirty shirt
        wash_shirt(shirt)
        # Wash the shirt to make it clean
